ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Interesting text (WAS:Interesting Giant in Warsliks Woods (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: one day a few weeks ago, venril sathir came to the zone of karnor s, apparently with no other reason but to kill the zone campers (this was before we ever
ygData.messageBody:
one day a few weeks ago, venril sathir came to the zone of karnor's,
apparently with no other reason but to kill the zone campers (this was
before we ever killed him, and no one aggro'd or pulled him in the zone).
all GMs insisted he was not GM controlled, people lost experience dying to
him. right before he came, there was a zone-wide emote "You feel as if you
should run" =)

Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel (also forever 54th)
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Heheh yep the very first one we heard was right before we
> moved into Maestro
> house in Hate. *You sense you are being watched*. Then *You
> hear the sad
> music of an organ in the distance*. Maestro wasn't up tho.
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
> forever 54th bardling, Veeshan
